welcome.subject: Welcome to CStore!
welcome.title: Welcome to CStore
welcome.body: Thank you for joining CStore, the cryptocurrency marketplace.
welcome.description: You can now start browsing products and making purchases using Bitcoin, Ethereum, or USDT.
welcome.footer: If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to our support team.

verification.subject: Verify Your Email - CStore
verification.title: Verify Your Email
verification.body: Please verify your email address to complete your registration.
verification.linkText: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.expiry: This link will expire in 24 hours.
verification.ignore: If you didn't create an account, you can safely ignore this email.

passwordReset.subject: Password Reset Request - CStore
passwordReset.title: Password Reset
passwordReset.body: You requested to reset your password. Click the button below to create a new password:
passwordReset.linkText: Or copy and paste this link into your browser:
passwordReset.expiry: This link will expire in 1 hour.
passwordReset.ignore: If you didn't request a password reset, you can safely ignore this email.

orderConfirmation.subject: Order Confirmation #{{orderNumber}}
orderConfirmation.title: Order Confirmation
orderConfirmation.thankYou: Thank you for your order! Here are the details:
orderConfirmation.instruction: Please send the exact amount to the address above to complete your order.

paymentConfirmation.subject: Payment Received - Order #{{orderNumber}}
paymentConfirmation.title: Payment Received
paymentConfirmation.body: Great news! We've received your payment.
paymentConfirmation.processing: Your order is now being processed and will be shipped soon.
paymentConfirmation.notification: You will receive another email when your order has been shipped.

shippingNotification.subject: Your Order Has Been Shipped - Order #{{orderNumber}}
shippingNotification.title: Order Shipped
shippingNotification.body: Good news! Your order has been shipped.
shippingNotification.delivery: Your order should arrive within 5-7 business days.
shippingNotification.closing: Thank you for shopping with CStore!
